shortdesc.ph: Agora provides ensured quality of experience (QoE) for worldwide Internet-based voice and video communications through a virtual global network optimized for real-time web and mobile-to-mobile applications.

ul.li: As of v2.3.3, Agora C++ API Reference for All Platforms can be downloaded from Dash, see FAQ for details.
As of v3.0.0, Agora deprecates the RtcEngineParameters class. class covers all APIs of this class, use the class instead.
During API calls, the SDK may returns error codes and warning codes. See Error Codes and Warning Codes.
provides the main methods that can be invoked by your application.
reports runtime events to the application.
provides methods that enable real-time communications in a specified channel. By creating multiple objects, the user can join multiple channels at the same time.
provides callbacks that report events and statistics of a specified channel.
allows for audio device interface testing.
allows for video device interface testing.

section.title: Statistics events
section.p: After joining a channel, SDK triggers this group of callbacks once every two seconds. We provide an advanced guide for these callbacks. For details, see Report In-call Statistics.

section.title: Multiple channels management
section.p: We provide an advanced guide on the applicable scenarios, implementation and considerations for this group of methods. For details, see Join Multiple Channels.

section.title: Screen sharing
section.p: We provide an advanced guide on the applicable scenarios, implementation and considerations for this group of methods. For details, see Share the Screen.

section.title: CDN publisher
section.p: This method applies only to interactive live streaming.

section.title: Face detection
section.p: This method is for Android and iOS only.

section.title: Audio routing control
section.p: This method is for Android and iOS only.

section.title: In-ear monitoring
section.p: This method is for Android and iOS only.

section.title: Video stream fallback
section.p: We provide an advanced guide on the applicable scenarios, implementation and considerations for this group of methods. For details, see Video Stream Fallback.

section.title: Pre-call network test
section.p: We provide an advanced guide on the applicable scenarios, implementation and considerations for this group of methods. For details, see Conduct a Last-mile Test.

section.title: Media metadata
section.p: This method applies only to interactive live streaming.

section.title: Watermark
section.p: This method applies only to interactive live streaming.

section.title: Device management
section.p: This group of methods are for Windows only.
